SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class QuestionBankManagementController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.QuestionBankManagementController
public class QuestionBankManagementController extends Object
Controller class for managing the question bank in the exam system. Provides functionality for adding, updating, deleting, filtering, and displaying questions.
Author:
Seokhyeon Hong

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionBankManagementController

      public QuestionBankManagementController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      initialize function initializes the controller. Sets up Choicebox options, TableView Columns, and refreshes the question table.

    • addQuestion

      private void addQuestion()
      addQuestion function gets initiated when the user clicks on add button. It adds a new question to the database using the data entered in the text field. Validates the input and shows an alert if any field is empty. If any input is invalid, it will show the respective alert

    • updateQuestion

      private void updateQuestion()
      Updates the selected question with new data entered in the text fields and from choice boxes. If no question is selected, an alert is shown. If any input is invalid, it will show respective alert

    • deleteQuestion

      private void deleteQuestion()
      Deletes the selected question from the database. If no question is selected, an alert is shown.

    • applyFilter

      public void applyFilter()
      Applies filters to the question list based on user input in the filter fields. Updates the table with the filtered questions.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the question table with the latest data from the database. Applies any active filters to the list.

    • resetFilter

      public void resetFilter()
      Resets the filter fields and refreshes the question table with all available questions.

    • clearSelection

      public void clearSelection()
      Clears all the input field for question.

    • validateScore

      private boolean validateScore(String score)
      Validates the score format. Valid score must be a positive integer.
      Parameters:
      score - the score text to validate
      Returns:
      true if the score format is valid, false otherwise

    • validateAnswerFormat

      private boolean validateAnswerFormat(String answer, String type)
      Validates the answer format based on the question type. Shows an alert if the format is incorrect and returns false.
      Parameters:
      answer - the answer text to validate
      type - the type of question ("Single" or "Multiple")
      Returns:
      true if the answer format is valid, false otherwise

    • sortAnswer

      private String sortAnswer(String answer)
      Sorts the answer string in alphabetical order.
      Parameters:
      answer - the answer text
      Returns:
      the sorted answer text

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String message)
      Displays an alert message using popup.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be displayed in the alert.
